text: The Men's 200 metres event at the 2005 European Athletics Indoor Championships was held on March 5–6. This was the last time the 200 metres were contested at European Indoor Championships. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Tobias Unger '''' |Chris Lambert '''' |Marcin Urbaś '''' |} ==Results== ===Heats=== The winner of each heat (Q) and the next 9 fastest (q) qualified for the semifinals. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
